judgment_text:
CP 541 of 1989 
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICTURE AT BOMBAY
ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
COMPANY PETITION NO.541 OF 1989 
WITH
OFFICIAL LIQUIDATOR'S REPORT DATED 18 07 2012
M/s.Premier Automobiles Limited 
.....Petitioner
Versus
M/s.Dhoot Agencies Private Limited (in Liqn.) 
 ..Respondent
Mrs.Manasi Jadhav, for ICICI Bank Ltd. 
Dr.T.Pandian, Official Liquidator, present. 

CORAM: S.J.KATHAWALLA, J.

  DATE:  9 th AUGUST 2012

P.C. : 
.
Perused the valuation report submitted by Shri Mahendra 
Bodhe. He has valued the movable properties at Rs.76,000/ . In view 
thereof, the reserved bid is fixed at Rs.80,000/ . EMD shall be 25% of the 
reserve bid.   Since the properties are worth approximately Rs.80,000/ 
only,     the   Official   Liquidator   shall   advertise   the   sale   of   the   movable 
properties by private treaty i.e. by displaying the sale notice on the web 
sites of this Hon'ble Court, Official Liquidator, High Court Bombay and the 
Ministry   of   Corporate   Affairs,   on   the   notice   board   of   the   Official 
Liquidator, DRT, Mumbai and also by sending the sale notice to the buyers 
who usually take part in the auction conducted by the Official Liquidator. 
ssp
/2
CP 541 of 1989 
.
 Prayer (d) of the Report is allowed. 
.
The Official Liquidator's Report is accordingly disposed of. 
( S.J.KATHAWALLA, J. ) 
ssp
/2
